languages.text: "Извинения приняты. За своевременное признание вины я дозволяю тебе выбрать способ собственной казни".
"Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."
languages.original_text: "Извинения приняты. За своевременное признание вины я дозволяю тебе выбрать способ собственной казни".

traits.locale_text: "Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I allow you to choose the method of your own execution."
"Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I allow you to choose the method of your own execution."
"Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."
"Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."
"Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."

languages.text: 「謝罪を受け入れる。速やかに罪を自白したため、処刑方法を自ら選ばせてやる」
languages.original_text: "Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."

traits.locale_text: 「謝罪を受け入れる。速やかに罪を自白したため、処刑方法を自ら選ばせてやる」

languages.text: “我接受你的道歉。如果你及时认罪，我恩准你选择自己的死法。”
languages.original_text: "Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."

traits.locale_text: “我接受你的道歉。如果你及时认罪，我恩准你选择自己的死法。”

languages.text: "Eure Entschuldigung ist angenommen. Aufgrund Eures prompten Schuldeingeständnisses gestatte ich Euch, selbst zu wählen, wie Ihr hingerichtet werdet."
languages.original_text: "Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Entschuldigung ist angenommen. Aufgrund Eures prompten Schuldeingeständnisses gestatte ich Euch, selbst zu wählen, wie Ihr hingerichtet werdet."

languages.text: « Vos excuses sont acceptées. En contrepartie de votre prompt aveu de culpabilité, je vous autorise à choisir les modalités de votre exécution. »
languages.original_text: "Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."

traits.locale_text: « Vos excuses sont acceptées. En contrepartie de votre prompt aveu de culpabilité, je vous autorise à choisir les modalités de votre exécution. »

languages.text: «Acepto su disculpa. Habida cuenta de su pronta admisión de culpa, permitiré que escoja el método de su ejecución».
languages.original_text: "Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."

traits.locale_text: «Acepto su disculpa. Habida cuenta de su pronta admisión de culpa, permitiré que escoja el método de su ejecución».

languages.text: "Özrün kabul edildi. Suçunu kabullenme konusunda tereddüt etmediğin için nasıl idam edileceğini seçmene izin vereceğim."
languages.original_text: "Your apology is accepted. For your prompt admission of guilt, I will allow you to choose the method of your execution."

traits.locale_text: "Özrün kabul edildi. Suçunu kabullenme konusunda tereddüt etmediğin için nasıl idam edileceğini seçmene izin vereceğim."
